condition: [NEQ](<*Table(select count(*) from MPA_PRICE_PLAN_MAPPING where Honeywell_Ref = '<*CTX(Quote.CustomField(MPA Honeywell Ref))*>' and Price_Plan_Status= 'Active' and Price_Plan_Parts_Discount = 'Y' and Price_Plan_Start_Date < '<*CTX( Date.Format(MM/dd/yyyy) )*>' and Price_Plan_End_Date > '<*CTX( Date.Format(MM/dd/yyyy) )*>' and Honeywell_Ref <>'')*>,0)
